text: Borislav Ivkov (November 12, 1933 - February 14, 2022) was a Serbian chess Grandmaster. He was a World championship candidate in 1965. He played in four more Interzonal tournaments, in 1967, 1970, 1973, and 1979. Ivkov was born in Belgrade, then-Yugoslavia. He was a three-time Yugoslav Champion (1958, 1963, 1972) and was the first World Junior Champion in 1951. Ivkov died on February 14, 2022 at the age of 88.Tuga, Srbija ostala bez VELEMAJSTORA pred kojim su padali svi svetski velikani: Preminuo slavni Bora Ivkov ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Yugoslavian chess players Category:Sportspeople from Belgrade Category:Serbian chess players
title: Borislav Ivkov
